pullRequest.title: issue #694 - Added ANTLR4 grammar for UCUM code syntax validation
pullRequest.bodyText:
Signed-off-by: Troy Biesterfeld tbieste@us.ibm.com
This change adds ANTLR4 grammar and a utility that can be used for UCUM code syntax validation.

commit.message:
issue #694 - Added ANTLR4 grammar for UCUM code syntax validation

Signed-off-by: Troy Biesterfeld <tbieste@us.ibm.com>

nodes.bodyText: Not familiar with antlr lexer/parser, so don't know if it's a big deal or not - is there not a way to avoid instantiating a new lexer/parser every time you want to parse a string?
